alert.note: Alert for Edgefield; Fairfield; McCormick; Newberry; Northern Lancaster; Saluda; Southern Lancaster (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued March 18 at 3:46AM EDT until March 19 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 9 AM EDT SUNDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures near 30 expected. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 29 possible late Sunday night through Monday morning. * WHERE...Portions of central South Carolina. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from 5 AM to 9 AM EDT Sunday. For the Freeze Watch, from late Sunday night through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Edgefield; Fairfield; McCormick; Newberry; Northern Lancaster; Saluda; Southern Lancaster
